safehome

Class CameraView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • safehome.CameraView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class CameraView
extends java.awt.Component
implements java.lang.Runnable
    CameraView class is a simple java component which has BufferedImage from DeviceCamera. This java component can be attached to any . This class creates a DeviceCamera instance. The camera instance reads camera image from the file camera.jpg and provides the image as anBufferedImage instance.

    Author:
    cs350TA
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • CameraView

        public CameraView(int id)
        Constructs camera view component. Constructor set the id of the camera instance and start a thread to repaint the updated camera image periodically. DeviceCamera reads an image from the file camera.jpg in the current working director. If the file cannot be opened, DeviceCamera shows an error message.

        Pre-condition: The main instantiates MainDemo class and MainDemo instantiates CameraTest class and CameraTest instantiates this class in consecutively

        Post-condition: jpg image file is loaded to memory and the camera instance is ready to draw. Thread is running to update camera view periodically.

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Paints this component. This method gets new image from camera device and re-draw image to the component.

        Pre-condition: JPG image file is loaded to camera device's memory and ready to draw

        Post-condition: A user can see the image from the camera component.

        Overrides:
        paint in class java.awt.Component
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics context to use for painting
        See Also:
        Component.paint(java.awt.Graphics)

      • run

        public void run()
        When an object implementing interface Runnable is used to create a thread, starting the thread causes the object's run method to be called in that separately executing thread. This thread updates view of the camera in periodic interval 100ms.

        Pre-condition: JPG image file is loaded to camera device's memory and ready to draw.

        Post-condition: A user can see the updated image from the camera

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        See Also:
        Runnable.run()
